name: Talia
background: A young, hot-headed scout from the Sky-Reach Aerie. She left her isolationist home seeking adventure and to prove her worth. She is fiercely independent but loyal to those who earn her respect.
narrative_hook: Talia is on a personal quest to track down a notorious Arcane Dominion captain who shot her down and left her for dead. This captain is a recurring antagonist who holds a valuable relic the party needs.

weapon_proficiency.bonus_effect: +1 to Attack Rolls with favored weapon types.
weapon_proficiency.penalty_effect: -2 to Attack Rolls with non-favored weapon types.

playstyles.description: This path focuses on Talia's peerless skill with the bow, turning her into a deadly marksman who can eliminate targets from extreme distances and exploit enemy weaknesses with pinpoint accuracy.

talents.name: Called Shot
talents.effect: As a bonus action, you can take a -2 penalty to your next ranged attack roll. If the attack hits, you deal an additional 1d8 damage.

talents.name: Eagle Eye (Passive)
talents.effect: You do not suffer disadvantage on ranged attack rolls due to long range.

talents.name: Pinning Shot
talents.effect: As a major action, you fire a special arrow at a target. The attack deals normal damage, and the target must make a Might DC 13 check or have their movement speed reduced to 0 for 1 round. This costs 5 Resolve.

talents.name: Find the Mark (Modifies Called Shot)
talents.effect: The bonus damage from your Called Shot ability increases from 1d8 to 1d10.

talents.name: Arcing Shot
talents.effect: You can make ranged attacks against targets that are behind half or three-quarters cover by arcing your shot over the obstacle.

talents.name: Rapid Fire
talents.effect: As a major action, you can make two ranged attacks instead of one, but both are made with a -2 penalty. This costs 10 Resolve.

talents.name: Deadeye (Passive)
talents.effect: Your ranged attacks now score a critical hit on a roll of 9 or 10.

talents.name: Ricochet Shot
talents.effect: You can use your Reaction to redirect a missed ranged attack to a new target within 15 feet of the original. Make a new attack roll with a -2 penalty against the new target.

talents.name: True Shot (Ultimate)
talents.effect: As a major action, you can make a single, perfect shot. This attack automatically hits, is a guaranteed critical hit, and deals maximum possible damage. This can only be used once per day and costs 20 Resolve.

playstyles.description: This path focuses on Talia's aerial superiority, emphasizing swift movements, battlefield control, and hit-and-run tactics, reminiscent of the swirling gusts of the Sky-Reach Aerie.

talents.name: Feather Fall
talents.effect: As a Reaction when you or an ally within 30 feet are falling, you can negate the falling damage.

talents.name: Gust
talents.effect: As a bonus action, you can unleash a small gust of wind at an adjacent enemy, pushing them 5 feet away. This does not deal damage.

talents.name: Talon Dive
talents.effect: As a bonus action, if you are currently flying, you can choose a single target below you. Your next melee attack against them has Advantage and deals an additional 1d8 damage. This costs 5 Resolve.

talents.name: Wind-Splitter Shot
talents.effect: When you make a ranged attack, you can channel the wind to add an extra 1d6 physical damage to your attack roll. This costs 5 Resolve.

talents.name: Aerial Supremacy (Passive)
talents.effect: While flying, all of your ranged attacks gain a +2 bonus to their attack roll.

talents.name: Hurricane Kick
talents.effect: As a major action, you make a melee attack. If it hits, the target is pushed back 15 feet. This movement does not provoke an Attack of Opportunity. This costs 10 Resolve.

talents.name: Ride the Wind
talents.effect: For 1 minute, you gain a flying speed of 60 feet and the ability to hover. This costs 15 Resolve.

talents.name: Redirecting Winds (Reaction)
talents.effect: When a ranged attack is made against an ally within 30 feet, you can use your Reaction to force a new attack roll with a -2 penalty against a different enemy within 15 feet of the original target. This costs 15 Resolve.

talents.name: Tornado (Ultimate)
talents.effect: As a major action, you summon a swirling tornado that lasts for 3 rounds. As a bonus action on each of your turns, you can move the tornado up to 30 feet. Any creature whose space the tornado enters must make a Might DC 18 check or be picked up, thrown 40 feet in a random direction, and take 5d10 bludgeoning damage. This can only be used once per day and costs 20 Resolve.
